applicability_reasoning: This regulation does not apply to this document for several reasons: 1) The document is a set of pension scheme rules that outline the structure, operation and benefits of a pension life cover scheme - it is not an advertisement. 2) While AIB Life is mentioned as the life office and registered administrator, this document serves as a legal/contractual document establishing the rules of the scheme rather than promoting or advertising any financial service. 3) The regulation specifically pertains to advertisements where a regulated entity has a position or holding in the financial service being advertised. This document makes no promotional claims and instead focuses on defining terms, establishing roles and responsibilities, and detailing scheme operations. 4) The document's purpose is regulatory compliance with pension legislation and scheme governance, not marketing or advertising of financial services.
regulation_title: Statement to be included where position or holding in a financial service
regulation_text: 387. (1) Where a regulated entity has a position or holding in the financial service that is the subject of an advertisement by that regulated entity, it shall include a statement to this effect in accordance with paragraph (2) in the advertisement. (2) For the purposes of paragraph (1), a regulated entity shall be deemed to have a position or holding in a financial service where it has an interest in the financial service in respect of which it may be subject to a financial gain or loss, and the statemen t required in accordance with paragraph (1) shall detail this possibility.
